page.title: 02VILLAGE TWINNING
page.content: Wingrave is different from many other villages because it is twinned with a village in France called La Bouexiere. This twinning started with a visit to France in 1984, since then many other events have been held both there and in Wingrave. The offical twinning of Wingrave and La Bouexiere was held in Wingrave on the 26th May 1985 at 19.30. For this occasion a tree was planted with a plaque below it and signs saying "Twinned with La Bouexiere" were added to the bottom of Wingrave signs. The purpose of the twinning was that children and adults from different countries can meet up and stay with each other and discover what it is like in a foreign country.
